CustomField.formula: if (AND(ISNULL(Exited_Date_Time__c), NOT( ExpirationProcessed__c )) ,if ( AND(NOT(ISNULL(SLA_Deadline__c)),NOT( SLAProcessed__c )) ,SLA_Deadline__c ,IF (NOT(ISNULL( Expiration_Deadline__c)) ,Expiration_Deadline__c, null)) ,null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The next date this stage history record should be checked.
CustomField.label: Next Verify Date
